column1: The Pit Room////Called an order in and picked it up curb side. I ordered half a chicken and potato salad. My oh my
column2: I was blown away by the sheer freshness of the meat
column3: and the season was spot on
column4: I can taste it through out the entire chicken down to the bone. Yea I sucked the bones too
column5: couldn't help myself. The potato salad wasn't bad either
column6: I just had to add a little little sugar and just like that it turned into heaven in my mouth! Best smoked chicken in the area hands down... I'll be paying you another visit soon
